trans-unit.source: Represents a proposed change to a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity" /> within a running workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Reprezentuje proponowanej zmiany do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity" /> w ramach działającego wystąpienia przepływu pracy.

trans-unit.source: This class is the base class for the canonical change actions which are added and removed and may be performed on a collection.
trans-unit.target: Ta klasa jest klasą bazową dla akcji canonical zmiany, które są dodawane i usuwane i może być wykonana w kolekcji.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityChangeAction" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Po zaimplementowaniu w klasie pochodnej inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityChangeAction" /> klasy.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityChangeAction" /> class.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityChangeAction" /> class, initializing the associated <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityChangeAction" /> klasy inicjowanie skojarzony <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="compositeActivity" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="compositeActivity" /> to odwołanie o wartości null (<see langword="Nothing" /> w języku Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityChangeAction.OwnerActivityDottedPath" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity" /> associated with this instance.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera i ustawia <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityChangeAction.OwnerActivityDottedPath" /> z <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity" /> skojarzony z tym wystąpieniem.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityChangeAction.OwnerActivityDottedPath" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity" /> associated with this instance.
This manipulates the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityChangeAction.OwnerActivityDottedPath%2A> member of the associated <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>.
Therefore, trying to set this without first initializing the associated <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> will cause an exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: W związku z tym próby ustawienia to bez uprzedniego zainicjowania skojarzony <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> spowoduje, że wyjątek zostanie wygenerowany.

trans-unit.source: The activity to have its changes validated.
Validates the changes pending on the target activity.
trans-unit.target: Weryfikuje oczekujące zmiany w działaniu docelowym.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationErrorCollection" /> that contains any <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationError" /> resulting from running each <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator" /> defined for the target activity.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationErrorCollection" /> zawiera którykolwiek <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationError" /> wynikające z każdego uruchomienia <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator" /> zdefiniowane dla działania docelowego.

trans-unit.source: If `contextActivity` cannot be safely cast to a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> a null reference is returned.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli `contextActivity` nie może być bezpiecznie rzutowany <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> zwracane jest odwołanie o wartości null.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="contextActivity" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="contextActivity" /> to odwołanie o wartości null (<see langword="Nothing" /> w języku Visual Basic).
